title: [NA] [LF Plat+ Subs] [Ranked 5v5] [ADC and Jungle]
body: Got a functional 5 v 5 team running and are planning on starting tournaments next weekend. Would like to practice most nights, but have some scheduling conflicts. Subs do have the opportunity to earn the main slots and can play in tournaments as we do have some scheduling conflicts with our main roster for some events. Message Forefront if you are interested and/or leave your information below. IGN: Position: Champion Pool:

replies.body:
IGN: MrIEnzy
Adc: Lucian, Corki, Sivir, Jinx Graves
Current Rank: Plat 3

Jungle Champ Pool: Vi, Rek sai, Lee sin, Fizz, J4

Current Rank: Plat 5
